task_name: Setup n8n Automation for Automated CV Screening
context: for automated CV screening using Gemini AI
description: Complete setup of n8n automation platform with Gmail integration and Gemini AI for automated resume screening. Based on Boomi Techie tutorial for processing 50 CVs in 90 minutes vs 20+ hours manually. This task establishes the foundation for Week 1 of the HR automation implementation.
dependencies: n8n account created (free tier or paid with EU datacenter)
Gmail account access for HR recruitment inbox
success_criteria: n8n workflow operational with all nodes configured
Gmail trigger successfully fires on new CV emails
Gemini AI analysis produces valid 21-field TSV output
Google Sheets receives and displays candidate data
Test run successful with 10 sample resumes
Error handling configured with email alerts

steps.name: Create n8n account with EU datacenter selection
steps.success_criteria: Account created, EU datacenter confirmed for GDPR compliance

steps.name: Connect Gmail to n8n workflow
steps.success_criteria: Gmail trigger node operational, test email received and processed

steps.name: Obtain Google Gemini API key
outputs: API key securely saved in n8n credentials
steps.success_criteria: API key generated, validated, and stored securely

steps.name: Create Google Sheets template for CV data
inputs: CV Parser v1 field list (21 fields)
outputs: Headers: Full_name, Email, Phone, LinkedIn, City, Country, Position_title, Work_experience_years, Total_experience_years, Education_degree, Education_field, Education_university, Languages, English_level, Key_skills, Previous_companies, Previous_industries, Availability_start_date, Salary_expectations, Visa_status, Additional_notes
steps.success_criteria: Template created with all 21 fields matching CV Parser output format

steps.name: Build n8n workflow nodes for CV processing
outputs: Complete n8n workflow with nodes: Gmail Trigger → Extract Attachment → Convert to Text → Gemini AI Analysis → Parse Response → Google Sheets Write → Notification
steps.success_criteria: All nodes connected, workflow executes without errors, test CV processed successfully

steps.name: Test workflow with 10 sample resumes
inputs: 10 sample CVs (5 strong candidates, 5 weak candidates)
outputs: 10 rows in Google Sheets with complete data
steps.success_criteria: All 10 resumes processed, data in Google Sheets, accuracy >90%, avg processing time <2 minutes per CV

steps.name: Document workflow and create usage guide
steps.success_criteria: Documentation complete, other team members can operate workflow independently

checklist.item: n8n account created with EU datacenter (Frankfurt or Amsterdam)
checklist.guide: GDPR compliance requirement for Austria/Ukraine operations

checklist.item: Gmail integration tested with sample email
checklist.guide: Send test email with CV attachment, verify trigger fires within 1 minute

checklist.item: Gemini API key valid and working
checklist.guide: Test with sample CV text, verify AI returns valid TSV response

checklist.item: Google Sheets template matches CV Parser v1 fields exactly
checklist.guide: All 21 fields in exact order: Full_name, Email, Phone, LinkedIn, City, Country, Position_title, Work_experience_years, Total_experience_years, Education_degree, Education_field, Education_university, Languages, English_level, Key_skills, Previous_companies, Previous_industries, Availability_start_date, Salary_expectations, Visa_status, Additional_notes

checklist.item: Error handling configured (email alerts if workflow fails)
checklist.guide: Add error trigger node sending email to HR team if any step fails

checklist.item: Test with diverse CV formats (PDF, DOC, DOCX)
checklist.guide: Ensure workflow handles all common resume formats

checklist.item: Documentation created and shared with team
checklist.guide: Other team members can follow guide independently without training
Data processing in EU, candidate consent obtained, retention policy defined

resources.name: Boomi Techie - n8n + Gemini CV Screening Tutorial
resources.description: Primary tutorial for building n8n workflow with Gemini AI for automated CV screening

resources.name: CV Parser v1 Prompt (PRM-HR-001)
resources.description: Structured prompt for extracting 21 fields from resumes in TSV format

resources.name: n8n Documentation - Gmail Integration
resources.description: Official n8n guide for Gmail node configuration

resources.name: Google Gemini API Documentation
resources.description: Official Google AI Studio and Gemini API documentation

resources.name: HR Videos Research Report
resources.description: Comprehensive research on HR automation tools and implementation strategies

roi_metrics.time_savings: From 20+ hours to 1.5 hours for processing 50 CVs (18.5 hours saved)
roi_metrics.time_per_cv: From 20-30 minutes manual to 90-120 seconds automated
roi_metrics.accuracy_improvement: 90%+ AI accuracy vs 85% manual (due to reviewer fatigue)
roi_metrics.annual_savings: €4,200+ in labor costs (based on 200 CVs/year at €25/hour saved time)

related_tasks: TASK-TEMPLATE-HR-006 (Parse Resume Using AI - from existing HR templates)
TASK-TEMPLATE-HR-007 (Add Candidate to CRM - from existing HR templates)
related_projects: Project-Template-003 (Complete HR Automation Implementation - 4 Week Plan)
source: HR videos research.md - Boomi Techie tutorial, Week 1 Implementation Plan
compliance_notes: EU datacenter required for GDPR compliance (Austria/Ukraine context). Candidate consent required before processing CVs. Data retention: 90 days maximum per GDPR Article 17. All processing logged in n8n execution history for audit trail.

troubleshooting.solution: Check Gmail label/folder configuration, verify OAuth connection, test with manual trigger first
Add delay between requests (5-10 seconds), use batch processing for large volumes, consider paid tier

troubleshooting.issue: CV text extraction fails for certain formats
troubleshooting.solution: Add OCR fallback for scanned PDFs, use multiple extraction methods, validate output before AI analysis
Verify OAuth scopes include Sheets write access, re-authenticate Google connection, check sheet sharing settings
Refine prompt with explicit TSV formatting instructions, add validation step before Sheets write, use error handling node

optimization_tips: Enable n8n workflow caching to reduce API calls
Use n8n sub-workflows for reusable components
Implement parallel processing for multiple CVs
Add candidate deduplication check before processing
Create dashboard in Google Sheets for real-time monitoring
Set up Slack/email notifications for high-scoring candidates (>85 score)
future_enhancements: Auto-send interview invitations to top candidates (score >85)
Integration with Notion ATS for automatic candidate card creation
Skill matching against job requirements database
